built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Semantic search tool for finding code snippets relevant to queries
built_in_tools.what_it_is: A semantic search engine for codebases
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Finds code snippets, functions, classes, and patterns that match semantic queries
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide search queries with optional directory targeting

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read file contents with line range support
built_in_tools.what_it_is: File content reader with selective line viewing
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Reads and displays file contents, supports partial file reading
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Specify file path and line ranges, or read entire files

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Edit existing files or create new files with precise control
built_in_tools.what_it_is: File editor for code modifications and creation
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Makes targeted edits to files, creates new files with specified content
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide target file, instructions, and code changes

built_in_tools.name: search_replace
built_in_tools.description: Search and replace operations on files
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Finds specific text patterns and replaces them with new content
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide file path, old string with context, and new string

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.description: Fast regex-based text search across files
built_in_tools.what_it_is: Regular expression search tool using ripgrep
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Searches for exact text patterns and regex matches across files
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide regex patterns with optional file type filters

built_in_tools.name: list_dir
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Shows files and subdirectories in specified paths

built_in_tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Runs shell commands and returns output
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide command string with background flag if needed

mcp_tools.name: mcp_memory_palace_memory_update
mcp_tools.description: Update Memory Palace with new knowledge and learnings
mcp_tools.what_it_does: Stores concepts, relationships, and learnings for future reference
mcp_tools.how_to_use: Provide workspace and updates array with knowledge items

mcp_tools.name: mcp_memory_palace_memory_query_contextual
mcp_tools.description: Query Memory Palace with contextual information
mcp_tools.what_it_does: Finds relevant stored knowledge based on context and queries
mcp_tools.how_to_use: Provide workspace, query text, and optional context

user_resources.name: mentalmodels.md
user_resources.what_it_is: Documentation file listing 54 mental models to implement
user_resources.what_it_does: Provides descriptions, use cases, and implementation guidance for mental models
user_resources.how_to_use: Reference for understanding requirements and specifications
relevant_for: Understanding what mental models need to be implemented

user_resources.name: existing_codebase
user_resources.description: PandA MCP codebase with existing mental model implementations
user_resources.what_it_is: Python codebase with planning and auditing framework
user_resources.what_it_does: Contains existing mental model implementations and framework structure
user_resources.how_to_use: Examine existing patterns, extend with new implementations
